title: Looking to create MELBOURNE based LoL team (D5+) for Upcoming Tournaments
body:
There are a number of League Tournaments coming up in Melbourne which I am keen to enter, unfortunately my current team live in different states.

I am looking to make a fresh team of positive / non-toxic players that will be able to commit to regular practice sessions leading up until the tournament.

There are only a couple of good teams that will be present at these tournaments so the competition won't be too tough. Prize money is quite substantial.

Add me for further details/expressions of interest

IGN: Fusion bluz0r

replies.poster: S E Y T A N
replies.body:
hey man I'm not diamond 5+ , but I'm down for Melbourne team. And you should just let me try out b4 u say no :) 

(its hard 2 get diamond or evn past silver, as to all the trolls an bad players u get in solo q)
